entry.title: Reproducible Environments for Reproducible Results
entry.summary:
Description

Trustworthy results require reproducibility. To guarantee reproducibility, source code and all external dependencies must be controlled. This session will include introductions to containers, Ansible, and Pulp. Attendees of any skill level can learn the tools and best practices for creating and managing reproducible environments.Presenter(s): Speaker: Bihan Zhang, Red Hat Speaker: Austin Macdonald, Red Hat
